Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us due to its unique features, innovative technology, and unparalleled craftsmanship. We believe it could be a valuable asset to you, offering significant benefits and enhancing your experience. Considering its worth and potential impact on your endeavors, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at the same value of $12000. We are confident it will exceed your expectations and contribute positively to your goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
